name: Bubblerio
description:
This game is made for the Game Jam by TRU students in COMP 1810  class (Group K):

Minh Anh Nguyen - T00645372

Minh Tuan Nguyen - T00615922

Thang Le Huu - T00629882

Pratham Goyal - T00611198

Game Story

Blue is bubble on a journey to rescue his girlfriend, Pink, from the forces of evil. He will face many enemies and obstacles along the way, and will venture through different environment. The road will be long and challenging, but with perseverance, Blue will come through and rescue Pink in the end.
